cleaned_text: Dr. Joseph K. Jones, DC Chiropractor2531 Rocky Ridge Rd Suite 112 Birmingham AL, 35243 [Show map](#) About Dr. Joseph Jones is a Chiropractor practicing in Birmingham, AL. Dr. Jones specializes in preventing, diagnosing, and treating conditions associated with the neuromusculoskeletal system, while improving each patients functionality and quality of life. Conditions treated include sciatica, neck pain, and arthritis pain, among many others. Dr. Jones seeks to reduce pain and discomfort through manipulation and adjustment of the spine. Jones, DC's reviews [Write Review](javascript:void(0);) Patient Experience with Dr. Jones Media Releases Get to know Chiropractor Dr. Joseph K. Jones, who serves patients in Birmingham, Alabama. Dr. Jones is a chiropractor serving Birmingham and the surrounding communities. He is affiliated with Rocky Ridge Chiropractic Care Center - a practice emphasizing enhancing patients health in an effort to reduce the risk of pain and illness to begin with. They take a more natural alternative to the treatment, prevention and control of many diseases, disorders and conditions; a path the patient's body recognizes and therefore responds to. Dr. Jones earned his Doctor of Chiropractic (DC) degree from Life University in 1990. Dr. Jones is an active member of the American Chiropractic Association (ACA). The ACA is the largest professional chiropractic organization in the United States. They provide professional and educational opportunities for all our members and are committed to being a positive and unifying force for the practice of modern chiropractic. Chiropractic is a health care profession. It is a form of alternative medicine mostly concerned with the diagnosis and treatment of mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system, especially the spine. As a chiropractor, Dr. Jones performs adjustments (manipulations) and other treatments to the spine or other parts of the body for the purpose of correcting alignment problems, easing pain, and supporting the body's natural ability to heal itself. With over 25 years of experience in the field, Dr. Jones has helped thousands of patients live a better life with less pain. He has received over 150 hours of applied clinical nutrition and authored numerous articles.
